hero.title: Digital Products
hero.subtitle: Transform your business with our comprehensive suite of digital products designed for modern enterprises
hero.sectionDescription: Comprehensive digital transformation products tailored for your business needs. From invoicing to e-commerce, we've got you covered.

einvoice.title: E-Invoice
einvoice.description: Transform your invoicing process with secure, automated digital solutions that ensure compliance while reducing costs and improving efficiency.

features.costReduction: Reduce invoice processing time by up to 80%
features.realTimeTracking: Real-time invoice tracking and status updates

eledger.title: E-Ledger
eledger.description: Transform financial record-keeping with digital ledger solutions ensuring legal compliance and financial transparency.

eexport.title: E-Export
eexport.description: Simplify international trade with comprehensive digital export documentation and compliance management solutions.

features.internationalStandards: Full compliance with international trade standards

restaurant.title: DigiGarson POS
restaurant.description: Comprehensive POS and management solutions specifically designed for food & beverage businesses.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce
ecommerce.description: Comprehensive e-commerce solutions that power your online business growth with integrated digital sales platforms.

edelivery.title: E-Delivery Note
edelivery.description: Digitize your delivery documentation process with real-time tracking and automated record-keeping for legal compliance.

earchive.title: E-Archive Invoice
earchive.description: Secure, long-term storage solutions for your digital invoices with full legal compliance and easy retrieval capabilities.

features.legalCompliance: Full legal compliance with retention requirements

eadisyon.title: E-Adisyon
eadisyon.description: Revolutionize restaurant operations with digital order receipt solutions that improve efficiency and customer experience.

additionalProducts.description: Our expert team is ready to help you implement the right digital products for your business needs. Contact us today to discuss your requirements.
